Anything 1-Fighter 1

Javascript is disabled. View full album

V 1.0

The F-1 (Fighter-1) Glass is a lightweight-Fighter that flies straight and starts with no ammo; you can place it yourself! you can make it a bomber (lightweight, of course, now stop placing these mk3 please.. No its not going to... work.), a fighter, a Commercial plane (No-war), whatever you want! Max speed i could see (It rounds 400,KMPH) 338kmph

DOWNLOAD IT HERE!

Skytravel Forum page

Use it all you want! and remember, the engine is hidden, so don't panic if you don't see it

(well, actually, you can see it, its very notable.. oh whatever )

-SkyTravel

--SpectreBubble
Good plane, might want to adjust the center of lift in line with the center of mass so that it doesn't pitch when iddle.

Good plane, might want to adjust the center of lift in line with the center of mass so that it doesn't pitch when iddle.

using SAS should fix it
